# iSectra - Virtual IT Department for Small Businesses

> Jacksonville, FL | IT Support & Managed Services | Founded 2006

## Company Overview

iSectra is a leading IT outsourcing and managed service provider based in Jacksonville, FL, serving small and medium-sized businesses across America since 2006. Unlike traditional MSPs, iSectra operates as a true virtual IT department, providing comprehensive end-to-end IT support without contracts or obligations.

### Core Philosophy
- No upselling of vendor systems
- Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
- All-American company with no outsourced work
- 365x24x7 support including holidays
- All engineers are Level 3 certified with 3+ years experience
- Monthly retainer contracts with no long-term obligations

### Leadership Team
- **Damian Colarte** - CEO & Founder
  LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dcolarte/
- **Bob Larsen** - COO
  LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bob-larsen-13336a8/
- **Roni Banerjee** - CMO & Investment Officer
  LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ronibanerjee/

## Services Overview

All services are included in one monthly bundled price. iSectra does not cherry-pick services or upcharge customers.

### 1. IT Support & Helpdesk
- 24x7x365 support (nights, weekends, all holidays)
- Minute-level response times
- All Level 3 engineers (no Level 1 or Level 2 support)
- Remote and on-site support available
- No extra charge for off-hours support

### 2. Device & Network Monitoring
- Powered by Tactical RMM (industry-standard RMM solution)
- 365x24x7 proactive monitoring
- Monitors servers, workstations, laptops, cell phones, network devices
- Real-time device health analysis
- Automatic patch management and updates
- Security threat monitoring and response

### 3. Cybersecurity Services
- Planning and implementation
- Penetration testing
- Regulatory compliance support
- Continuous security monitoring
- Malware detection and prevention
- Full data encryption
- Microsoft Defender integration
- Compliance frameworks: HIPAA, SOX, CMMC, NIST, IPAA

### 4. Microsoft 365 Management
- Complete Microsoft 365 optimization
- Certified Microsoft Silver Partner (Small and Midmarket Cloud Solutions Provider)
- Support for all M365 applications:
  - Microsoft Teams
  - SharePoint
  - Azure Active Directory
  - Microsoft Defender
  - Microsoft Compliance Manager
- License optimization (most businesses only use 10% of available features)
- User training and support

### 5. IT Asset Management
- Comprehensive hardware and software tracking
- Procurement management (servers, desktops, laptops, networking devices)
- Software licensing compliance
- Hardware support and maintenance
- Full lifecycle management (procurement to disposal)
- Microsoft Teams and SharePoint integration for asset tracking

### 6. Cloud Services & Data Centers
- Own world-class data centers in Jacksonville, FL
- Microsoft Azure cloud services (preferred backup solution)
- 24x7 monitoring
- Industry-standard redundancy
- Multiple data center failover mechanisms
- 100% uptime commitment

### 7. Backup & Disaster Recovery
- Microsoft Azure cloud backup (primary)
- Secure private data center backup (alternative)
- Proactive disaster recovery planning
- Business continuity planning
- Minimal downtime strategies
- Cost-effective solutions tailored to budget

### 8. Internet Services (ISP)
- Partnership with WiFast for nationwide coverage
- White-glove ISP service
- 100% redundancy for "always on" connectivity
- Transparent pricing with no hidden fees
- Alternative to Comcast, Optimum, Verizon
- Latency and jitter monitoring

### 9. VoIP & Communication Systems
- Full encryption (unlike most providers)
- Desktop and web-based clients
- Video calling capabilities
- Features: auto attendant, conference bridges, call queues, reporting, paging, call parking
- Voicemail and faxing
- Network quality monitoring (latency/jitter)

### 10. Website Hosting & Management
- Hosted in iSectra's data centers
- Redundant infrastructure
- High-performance hosting with fast load times
- Robust security (firewalls, encryption, malware detection)
- Comprehensive management: updates, backups, monitoring, optimization
- Scalable resources for traffic spikes

### 11. Data Cabling & Infrastructure
- Server room cabling
- Office-wide network infrastructure
- High-quality structured cabling
- Professional installation

### 12. IT Consulting & vCIO Services
- Virtual CIO services included (not upcharged)
- IT strategy alignment with business goals
- Technology roadmap development
- Senior-level IT leadership without executive costs
- Strategic planning and implementation
- Competitive advantage through technology

### 13. Compliance & Auditing
- Continuous IT audits
- Regulatory compliance support:
  - HIPAA (Healthcare)
  - SOX (Financial)
  - CMMC (Defense)
  - NIST (Federal)
  - IPAA (Various industries)
- Gap analysis and vulnerability assessment
- Comprehensive audit reports
- Risk mitigation strategies

### 14. Enterprise Software Support
- Support for all industry-standard enterprise software
- Cloud migration services
- On-premise to data center migrations
- Vendor collaboration for uptime
- Disaster recovery planning
- Business continuity solutions

## Pricing & Value Proposition

### Pricing Model
- Monthly retainer contracts
- No long-term commitments
- Transparent, predictable pricing
- Average example: 10 employees = ~$2,000/month (all-inclusive)

### What's Included
- Unlimited support tickets
- All services listed above
- 365x24x7 monitoring
- All upgrades and updates
- Full IT asset management
- Cybersecurity protection
- Compliance management
- Consulting and strategic planning

### Cost Comparison
Total cost of ownership typically lower than:
- Traditional IT companies
- Standard MSPs
- In-house IT departments
- Includes: contract costs, downtime prevention, risk mitigation, compliance costs, productivity optimization

## Onboarding Process

1. **Free Consultation** - Meet with an Engineer (not a salesperson)
2. **Business Assessment** - Map business environment using industry frameworks
3. **Technology Audit** - Assess current IT infrastructure
4. **Proposal Development** - Custom solution within 48 hours
5. **1-Month Free Trial** - No-obligation trial period
6. **Implementation** - Technology roadmap with schedules, costs, quality management
7. **24x7 Support Activation** - Immediate monitoring and support
8. **Continuous Improvement** - Step-by-step optimization to industry best practices

## Geographic Coverage

- **Headquarters**: Jacksonville, FL
- **Service Area**: Nationwide (entire United States)
- **Service Model**: Primarily remote support with on-site visits when needed
- **On-Site Support**: Engineers available across America for on-site needs

## Certifications & Partnerships

- Microsoft Silver Partner (Small and Midmarket Cloud Solutions Provider)
- Tactical RMM certified
- WiFast ISP partner
- Multiple vendor partnerships for hardware procurement
- Compliance framework certifications: HIPAA, SOX, CMMC, NIST, IPAA

## Contact Information

- **Phone**: 845-563-0346
- **Email**: info@isectra.com
- **Website**: https://isectra.com
- **Support**: Available 24x7x365
- **Contact Methods**: Phone, email, text, live chat

## Key Differentiators

### vs. Traditional MSPs
1. **Business Alignment**: Focus on business outcomes, not just "node management"
2. **No Upselling**: Act as internal IT department, not vendor resellers
3. **Transparent Pricing**: All-inclusive monthly fee, no hidden charges
4. **Senior Engineers**: All Level 3 engineers, no tiered support structure
5. **24x7 Availability**: True round-the-clock support including all holidays
6. **No Contracts**: Monthly retainers with no long-term obligations

### vs. In-House IT
1. **Cost Savings**: Fraction of full IT department cost
2. **Expertise**: Access to multiple senior engineers vs. 1-2 staff
3. **Coverage**: 24x7 availability vs. business hours only
4. **No HR Overhead**: No hiring, training, benefits management
5. **Scalability**: Grow or reduce services based on needs
6. **Latest Technology**: Continuous investment in tools and training

### vs. National Providers
1. **Personalized Service**: Know your business and team
2. **Rapid Response**: Minutes vs. hours or days
3. **American-Based**: All engineers in USA, no outsourcing
4. **Strategic Partnership**: Long-term relationship focus
5. **Business Integration**: Align with business goals and strategy

## Company Values & Mission

### Mission
Disrupt the broken IT Services industry by empowering businesses with technology instead of fear-mongering to sell support and products.

### Vision
Be the driving force behind a paradigm shift in IT services where businesses experience seamless fusion of technology and strategy, propelling them to new heights of success in the digital era.

### Core Values
- Transparency in all dealings
- No vendor upselling
- Customer empowerment over fear tactics
- 24x7 commitment to customer success
- American workforce and values
- Personal relationships and care
- Continuous improvement and innovation

## Technology Stack & Tools

### Monitoring & Management
- Tactical RMM (Remote Monitoring and Management)
- Custom monitoring tools
- Real-time alerting systems

### Microsoft Ecosystem
- Microsoft 365 / Office 365
- Azure Active Directory
- Microsoft Defender
- Microsoft Compliance Manager
- Microsoft Teams
- SharePoint
- Azure Cloud Services

### Security Tools
- Firewall management
- Encryption systems
- Malware detection and prevention
- Vulnerability scanning
- Penetration testing tools

### Communication Platforms
- VoIP systems with video
- Desktop and web clients
- Auto-attendant systems
- Conference bridge systems

## Ideal Customer Profile

### Business Size
- Small businesses (5-50 employees)
- Medium businesses (50-500 employees)
- Companies needing enterprise-level IT without enterprise costs

### Industries Served
- Healthcare (HIPAA compliant)
- Finance (SOX compliant)
- Defense contractors (CMMC compliant)
- Professional services
- Manufacturing
- Retail
- General business services

### Customer Needs
- Businesses wanting to focus on core operations, not IT
- Companies needing 24x7 IT support
- Organizations requiring compliance management
- Businesses seeking predictable IT costs
- Companies wanting strategic IT alignment
- Organizations needing comprehensive cybersecurity

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Pricing
**Q: How do you price services?**
A: Custom pricing based on business needs assessment. Industry framework mapping → technology assessment → proposal with monthly retainer. Average ~$2,000/month for 10 employees.

**Q: Are you more expensive?**
A: Total cost of ownership is typically lower when factoring downtime prevention, risk mitigation, compliance costs, and productivity gains.

### Service Model
**Q: Why are you different than MSPs?**
A: Focus on business alignment and outcomes, not just device/node management. No vendor upselling. True IT department model.

**Q: Can you support us remotely?**
A: Yes, 15+ years of remote support experience with industry-leading tools. On-site visits available when needed.

**Q: Do I need all your services?**
A: Service agreements customized based on actual needs, risks, and ROI expectations.

### Onboarding
**Q: How do you onboard customers?**
A: Technology roadmap → implementation plan → 24x7 monitoring setup → step-by-step migration to best practices and compliance.

### Compliance
**Q: Are you compliant?**
A: 20 years of regulatory compliance experience across HIPAA, SOX, CMMC, NIST, IPAA and other frameworks.

## Call to Action

Start with a no-obligation free consultation and 1-month trial. Contact iSectra at 845-563-0346 or info@isectra.com to discuss your IT challenges and receive a customized technology roadmap within 48 hours.
